mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spmember_detail( mem_num, name, passwd, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2 ) VALUES( #{mem_num}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_num, m.id, m.auth, d.au_id, d.passwd, m.nick_name, d.email FROM spmember m LEFT OUTER JOIN spmember_detail d ON m.mem_num = d.mem_num WHERE m.id = #{id}
